details: As well as my current role as a Javascript engineer on the crowdfunding product I also lead the frontend community in JustGiving.
responsibilities: mentor junior developers to help them in their careers
core contributor to the share component library that is used throughout JustGiving

details: JustGiving is one of the worlds largest online giving platforms. Have worked across several teams in the company working on various projects to modernise JustGivings front-end applications using React.
responsibilities: part of a cross functional team tasked with rebuilding the fundraising page, JustGivings core product, using React and Redux
core member of a development team who maintain and add new functionality to Justgivingâ€™s crowdfunding platform, a large scale React/Redux app written in TypeScript
created an analytics React component library that easily allows developers to integrate analytics tracking into React projects

details: Four month contract in IBM's design studio as a front-end developer. Part of a team tasked with finding new ways to communicate IBM's Design Thinking. The project went on to win an IDI award for best Design Education and Industry project.
responsibilities: working with designers to rapidly build prototypes to validate concepts
working with the team to build a working prototype of the system we proposed which was eventually presented to the president and chief technical officer of IBM Design

details: Joined a full development team for a 5 month work placement as a web developer. As a result of my performance I was offered a part time position when college resumed.
responsibilities: working as part of the development team to build commercial applications and websites
working closely with experienced designers to ensure the finished application/website met the high standards the client expected
providing client training on completion of products
designing, developing and maintaining fully functioning websites, several of these were integrated with the businesses custom backend systems
working with a backend developer to add new features to the website/backend system
working with an SEO expert to ensure the website ranked as high as possible organically
